attributes.review: I wanted to give trumps app 5 stars but was very displeased by the content on the app there were many glitches. Anyway I highly recommend reading the bee movie script because the vibes are immaculate 😘😊

The app was honestly so annoying and it kept giving me a picture of this orange dude, I honestly was really disturbed by it. I’m not one to stop y’all from downloading this app, but if you do invest in some eye bleach 😔
attributes.title: Yikes
attributes.userName: I am a very honest person

attributes.review: As myself a trump supporter I decided to download this wonderful app to keep up with our JENIUS president💖❤️. But I really think this app should add more games🎮. It needs spice✨💖🧚🏿. 💯% would not download❤️. If you could so please get rid of the app🤪👁👄👁
attributes.title: no❤️

attributes.review: Glitchy, impossible to navigate, too many notifications
attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: I sat down hoping to learn more about our “wonderful country” from our “amazing president” and threw up instead. Thanks for that trump. Not only are you a racist, homophobic, transphobic, misogynistic pig, but you also make 16 year old girls physically sick.
attributes.title: Ew.

attributes.review: my grandson installed the trump app for me so i can vote for trump🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸 but i could not vote on the app. it’s probably because of the demoRATS (lol see what i did there), but anyways time to go shoot some deer and crack a cold one with my son
attributes.title: this app makes no sense

attributes.review: Wow this is the worst app ever! I am a supporter of our saviour and leader mr Cheeto jesus but wow this app really didn’t work for me. I decided to try this out after I looked on his twitter and Instagram for his fake tanning tutorial but I just couldn’t find it! 😭😭

attributes.review: I really wanted to support our wonderful president with his app but I absolutely regret downloading. Ever since I downloaded bad things have been happening, it cursed. If you value your safety please don’t download it.
